verses.verse: וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> prayed יוֹנָ֔ה <WH3124> Then Jonah אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> his God מִמְּעֵ֖י <WH4578> belly הַדָּגָֽה׃ <WH1710> out of the fish's

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And said קָ֠רָאתִי <WH7121> I cried מִצָּ֥רָה <WH6869> by reason of mine affliction לִ֛י אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> and he heard מִבֶּ֧טֶן <WH990> me out of the belly שְׁא֛וֹל <WH7585> of hell שִׁוַּ֖עְתִּי <WH7768> cried שָׁמַ֥עְתָּ <WH8085> I [and] thou heardest קוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> my voice

וַתַּשְׁלִיכֵ֤נִי <WH7993> For thou hadst cast מְצוּלָה֙ <WH4688> me into the deep בִּלְבַ֣ב <WH3824> in the midst יַמִּ֔ים <WH3220> of the seas וְנָהָ֖ר <WH5104> and the floods יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי <WH5437> compassed כָּל־ <WH3605> All מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ <WH4867> me about all thy billows וְגַלֶּ֖יךָ <WH1530> and thy waves עָלַ֥י <WH5921> over עָבָֽרוּ׃ <WH5674> passed over

וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> Then I said נִגְרַ֖שְׁתִּי <WH1644> I am cast out מִנֶּ֣גֶד <WH5048> from עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> of thy sight אַ֚ךְ <WH389> Nevertheless אוֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> again לְהַבִּ֔יט <WH5027> yet I will look אֶל־ <WH413> toward הֵיכַ֖ל <WH1964> temple קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> toward thy holy

אֲפָפ֤וּנִי <WH661> compassed me about מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> The waters עַד־ <WH5704> to the point נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> [even] to the soul תְּה֖וֹם <WH8415> the depth יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי <WH5437> closed me round about ס֖וּף <WH5488> the weeds חָב֥וּשׁ <WH2280> were wrapped about לְרֹאשִֽׁי׃ <WH7218> my head

לְקִצְבֵ֤י <WH7095> to the bottoms הָרִים֙ <WH2022> of the mountains יָרַ֔דְתִּי <WH3381> I went down הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> the earth בְּרִחֶ֥יהָ <WH1280> with her bars בַעֲדִ֖י <WH1157> around לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> [was] about me for ever וַתַּ֧עַל <WH5927> yet hast thou brought up מִשַּׁ֛חַת <WH7845> from corruption חַיַּ֖י <WH2416> my life יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֤ף <WH5848> fainted עָלַי֙ <WH5921> When נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> When my soul אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God זָכָ֑רְתִּי <WH2142> within me I remembered וַתָּב֤וֹא <WH935> came in אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> and תְּפִלָּתִ֔י <WH8605> and my prayer אֶל־ <WH413> about הֵיכַ֖ל <WH1964> temple קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> unto thee into thine holy
מְשַׁמְּרִ֖ים <WH8104> They that observe הַבְלֵי־ <WH1892> vanities שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> lying חַסְדָּ֖ם <WH2617> their own mercy יַעֲזֹֽבוּ׃ <WH5800> forsake

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I בְּק֤וֹל <WH6963> unto thee with the voice תּוֹדָה֙ <WH8426> of thanksgiving אֶזְבְּחָה־ <WH2076> But I will sacrifice לָּ֔ךְ אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָדַ֖רְתִּי <WH5087> [that] that I have vowed אֲשַׁלֵּ֑מָה <WH7999> I will pay יְשׁוּעָ֖תָה <WH3444> Salvation לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [is] of the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD לַדָּ֑ג <WH1709> unto the fish וַיָּקֵ֥א <WH6958> and it vomited out אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹנָ֖ה <WH3124> Jonah אֶל־ <WH413> onto הַיַּבָּשָֽׁה׃ <WH3004> upon the dry פ
